inclusion.criterion: One hundred eighty-four patients were enrolled after informed consent and randomly allocated to each treatment arm by 1:1 randomization through simple random allocation.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All eligible pregnant or post partum women with systolic blood pressure ≥160mm of Hg or diastolic BP ≥110 mm Hg, on repeat measurement after 15 minutes of rest, admitted through emergency and outpatients department, were invited for participation in the study.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Data was recorded on a case report form (CRF).
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with cardiac failure and heart block.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Patient tolerated an inpatient trial of sildenafil without hypotension.
